page.title: 10Housing
page.content:
Housing
About 20% of the houses in the block are privately owned, the only block of council houses are at Tump Lane, although some houses are rented from local landowners. The houses date from the 15th century, to ones built in the last few years. There are three large houses in the block, Bryngwyn Manor, Strickstenning Hall and Lyston House and 14 farms. Most of the older houses have been altered or extended to give up-to-date living standards but some still have amenities available in the 19th century. Nearly all houses have mains electricity, but few main drainage. There are still many houses using private water supplies.
